page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY IN SWINFORD
page.content: I woke up{7.30 a.m.}and picked up a fantasy book called 'The Warlock of Firetop Mountain' but soon put it down and fell asleep again.{8.20 a.m.}I dressed and went to down to breakfast. I bribed a lift to school from dad and played football in the playground.{ {9.10 a.m.}The school bus arrived with children from outlying homes. We did maths until assembly when we prayed for the victims of the Bangladesh flood. Afterwards we had a recorder practice before playtime.{11.00 a.m.} Prepared for our cycling proficiency test by riding around a course in the playground.{12.10 p.m.}Dinner of bangers and mash with spaghetti followed by a chocolate slice.{1.30 {p.m.}We wrote about Belvoir Castle in the afternoon.{7.00 p.m.}After tea we went to cubs, then birdwatching. Sleep at{10.30 p.m.
